DOC.brief_summary: To compare ability Prevnar® Pneumo® 23 reduce prevent nasopharyngeal carriage vaccine-type pneumococcus one year respective immunization . To evaluate rate penicillin-resistant pneumococcus nasopharyngeal carriage .
DOC.brief_title: Study Comparing Prevenar® Pneumo 23 Reducing Carriage Children
DOC.detailed_description: This study require 6 month complete ( 3 month nasopharyngeal sample collection ; 3 month dor analysis ) . Each child participate 1 day period .
DOC.criteria: Healthy child 2 9 year old . No history antibiotic use prior 1 month enrollment No history invasive pneumococcal disease
